channel.title: Advertising on mopar is annoying...help!
channel.description:
When I advertise on mopar server status it always says two things.
You only get one post, one server. (Even when i searched for my servers name and my other comp's) Error Server is offline. Please turn it on to register it (But my server is up)
Someone should fix all of the bugs on the server status pages...[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2008, 06:13:33 pm[/size][hr]woops ok heres what happened...I checked again if it was on any lists. and it was on page 24...how do i take it off the list!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?

item.title: Advertising on mopar is annoying...help!
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:

When I advertise on mopar server status it always says two things.

Error Server is offline. Please turn it on to register it (But my server is up)
